title: Ahmed Abdel Moneim
text:
Ahmed Abdel Moneim (; born 8 January 1973), commonly known as Ahmed Koshary, is an Egyptian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> manager and a former player.
International career.
Abdel Moneim made some appearances for the <a href="Egypt%20national%20football%20team">Egypt national team</a>, including <a href="1996%20African%20Cup%20of%20Nations">1996 African Cup of Nations</a> in South Africa where he participated as a substitute against <a href="South%20Africa%20national%20football%20team">South Africa</a> and <a href="Zambia%20national%20football%20team">Zambia</a>. He scored his only goal for Egypt came against <a href="South%20Korea%20national%20football%20team">South Korea</a> in a 1–1 friendly draw.
Honours.
Al Ahly
